title: Roxane by Stuart Gluth
content:
Does anybody know if the typeface Roxane   
by Stuart Gluth has been published?   
   
Can anybody tell me more about the project   
on this link?   
 [http://www.id.iit.edu/visiblelanguage/Feature%20Articles/Roxane/Roxane.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018081612/http:/www.id.iit.edu/visiblelanguage/Feature%20Articles/Roxane/Roxane.html)   
   
Thanks in advance,   
Nicolai
author: nicolai

comments.content:
These types of fonts rarely get published, because they rarely get finished (accents, hinting, etc.) but you should try just asking Gluth. If you can't find him, ask Visible Language for contact info (or try Google).   
   
hhp
Thanks for the quick reply Hrant. I

Glad you liked it.   
The next part will be out in two weeks (in sowftare development years)... ;-)   
   
hhp
